title: Salesforce Agentforce vs Gemini Deep Research: Which agent platforms Tool is Better in 2026?

introduction:
Choosing between Salesforce Agentforce and Gemini Deep Research can be challenging. Both platforms offer powerful agent platforms capabilities, but they take different approaches and cater to different needs.

In this comprehensive comparison, we'll analyze both platforms across key dimensions: features, pricing, ease of use, and ideal use cases. Whether you're enterprise-ai, this guide will help you make an informed decision.

sections.title: Overview
paragraphs: Salesforce Agentforce is Salesforce Agentforce is an enterprise agentic AI platform with 8,000+ customers generating $900M in AI revenue. Features autonomous agents powered by Atlas Reasoning Engine..
Gemini Deep Research, on the other hand, Gemini Deep Research is Google's autonomous research agent powered by Gemini 3 Pro. Achieves 46.4% on Humanity's Last Exam with iterative investigation..

verdict:
Both Salesforce Agentforce and Gemini Deep Research are excellent agent platforms platforms with distinct strengths.

Choose Salesforce Agentforce if:
- You need enterprise-ai
- You prefer their pricing model
- Their approach matches your workflow

Choose Gemini Deep Research if:
- google are your priority
- You prefer their value proposition
- Their solution fits your needs better

Ultimately, both tools can deliver excellent results. Your choice should depend on your specific requirements, budget, and preferred workflow.
